alert.note: Alert for Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 01 at 12:21PM EDT until August 01 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Whitesburg affecting Letcher County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High water caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Whitesburg. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested, but will continue to run high through late this afternoon. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 4 PM.
